message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.NE 

The paper proposes a novel approach for video-based action recognition using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) and temporal pooling. This falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper involves the use of deep learning techniques (cs.MM) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) to improve the performance of action recognition. Finally, the paper also involves the use of unique convolutional filter banks (cs.NE) to tackle the problem of parameter explosion.
